## Disclaimer
This notebook gives a few scratch ideas on how to use the package `sommer` for a simple linear multivariate mixed model analysis.


## Installation
The first step is to install the package that we want to experiment with

```{r}
if (!require(sommer))
  install.packages("sommer")
```
